intro_text: Former laboratory technician turned web developer, I design applications as I used to prepare solutions: with precision, method, and curiosity. Passionate about logic and structure, I seek useful, sustainable, and well-thought-out projects. Today, I put my code at the service of your ideas.
about_text: Discover my somewhat acrobatic journey, my values as a web gardener, and how I help ideas grow online.
projects_text: Explore my web development creations, from showcase websites to SOLID and custom applications. Each project is a new adventure, a new learning ground, a new pride.
services_text: I help you create modern websites, efficient interfaces, or well-designed APIs. Whether you are a craftsman, freelancer, or idea carrier, I translate your needs into functional logic.
contact_text: Whether you have a precise idea in mind or just want to move forward, feel free to send me a message.
